title: Only for You
description: It is said that people’s lives are tales of two great journeys - the pursuit of happiness and the search for true love.Edward seems to have achieved one of these ultimate goals by falling in love with Daisy.But in his quest for true love, will he be willing to let go of his one special friend, and perhaps, sacrifice his chance for happiness?If there’s a choice between love and friendship, will Edward sacrifice one for the other? Will he be able to live with his choice and never ask himself what if he chose the other?
author: Tista Ray
